Name: Dick Wilde 2
About the game: The local lakes and ravines have been infected by a toxic outbreak! Pair up with your friends in co-op mode and take on the deadly ooze and its disgusting dwellers. Play with a friend: Dick Wilde 2 is always more fun with a friend. Team up with your buddy over network co-operative play and take down the source of the toxic outbreak! New Epic Bosses: Face off against new enemies on a gargantuan scale, including vicious piranhas, manic moles and even a giant enemy crab! Insane Weapons Players can clear the swamplands with 16 all-new super-powered weapons - from physics-defying beam guns to homemade revolvers. Hats, lots of em Whether you want a dapper tophat or feel like putting on a traffic cone, we have got you covered. Hold On Tight, This Rideâ€™s About to Get Bumpy! Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR and SynthesisVR .
